scripts.build: lessc --clean-css source/css/styles.less minified/jplist.core.min.css && uglifyjs source/js/app.js source/js/app/namespaces.js source/js/app/history.js source/js/app/dto/statuses-dto-collection.js source/js/app/dto/status-dto.js source/js/app/events/pubsub.js source/js/app/services/*.js source/js/dal/**/*.js source/js/domain/dom/**/*.js source/js/domain/server/**/*.js source/js/ui/**/*.js -o minified/jplist.core.min.js --source-map minified/jplist.core.min.js.map
